column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: century. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix my: <http://www.semanticweb.org/user/ontologies/2021/century#> .my:Century rdf:type rdfs:Class .my:timePeriod rdf:type rdf:Property .my:timePeriod rdfs:range xsd:integer .my:timePeriod rdfs:domain my:Century .my:FirstCentury rdf:type my:Century;my:timePeriod "100"^^xsd:integer .my:SecondCentury rdf:type my:Century;my:timePeriod "200"^^xsd:integer .my:ThirdCentury rdf:type my:Century;my:timePeriod "300"^^xsd:integer .```
